item.title: Courses for Spring 2019
item.description: Category A. Philosophy of Science PHI 152 (QR) Scientific Reasoning There may or may not be a Scientific Method. But there are definitely scientific methods. What are they? How and why do they work? And when science fails, what are some ways it fails? We will learn, use, and debate ideas about how to think scientifically. And we will observe science succeeding and failing in case-studies from current research and the history of science.
